raw_text: TILLEKERATNE,​ LASANTHIE THERESE – Beloved wife of Nelson Tillekeratne,​ loving mother of Nishani and Ashley,​ affectionate grandmother of Tanaka,​ loving sister of Melitus,​ beloved daughter of late Mr and Mrs Kulasekera,​ expired. Remains lie at “Mont Calm”,​ No. 203,​ Galahitiyawa,​ Ganemulla. Funeral takes place on 15th Wednesday at 3.00 p.m. at Tibbotugoda Church Cemetery,​ Ganemulla. Friends and relations,​ please accept this intimation.074193
